meta.name: Shadowfell Rift
meta.description: A linear fortress descent through Durnhollow to close the Shadowfell Rift and defeat Void Lord Malachar.

rooms.name: Entry Chamber
rooms.description: Heavy oak doors open to a circular chamber hewn from black stone, its vaulted ceiling lost in shadow. Flickering torchlight dances across crude goblin markings on the walls, while sulfur and decay seep from cracks in the floor.

mobs.name: Goblin Scout
mobs.personality: Skittish lookout that fights desperately when cornered.

rooms.name: Guard Barracks
rooms.description: Rows of moldering bunks line the stone walls, rotted straw spilling across the floor. A bloodied soldier clutches his wounded side behind an overturned table.

mobs.name: Goblin Guard
mobs.personality: Disciplined sentry that holds its ground and blocks the way forward.

npcs.name: Marcus
npcs.title: Wounded Soldier
dialogue: warns about shadows in the deep

rooms.name: Storage Room
rooms.description: Broken crates and scattered provisions fill this dusty chamber. Rats skitter in the corners, and the air smells of stale grain and mildew.

rooms.name: Barracks Hall
rooms.description: A long hall lined with weapon racks, most stripped bare. Scorch marks on the walls tell of recent battle. The stench of goblin occupation hangs thick.

mobs.name: Goblin Raider
mobs.personality: Reckless brute that charges in swinging wildly.

mobs.name: Goblin Shaman
mobs.personality: Cowardly spellcaster that hides behind allies and lashes out when exposed.

rooms.name: Collapsed Library
rooms.description: Bookshelves have toppled like dominoes, their contents reduced to ash and rot. A faint arcane hum emanates from somewhere beneath the rubble.

mobs.name: Dust Wraith
mobs.personality: Ethereal predator that drifts silently and strikes from the shadows.

rooms.name: Central Corridor
rooms.description: A wide corridor where four passages meet. Torch sconces flicker with unnatural blue flame. The stone floor is worn smooth by centuries of boots.

rooms.name: Chapel Ruins
rooms.description: Shattered pews lie scattered across cracked stone. A defiled altar stands at the far end, weeping black ichor. The air recoils from whispered prayers in dark tongues.

mobs.name: Corrupted Priest
mobs.personality: Cunning spellcaster that curses intruders before closing in to finish them.

npcs.name: Brother Aldric
npcs.title: Ghostly Monk
dialogue: the rift corrupts all it touches
the boss guards the rift below
you must work together to survive

rooms.name: Great Hall
rooms.description: A cavernous hall with vaulted ceilings lost in darkness. Tattered banners hang from the walls, their heraldry consumed by creeping shadow. The throne at the far end sits empty and cracked.

mobs.name: Shadow Warrior
mobs.personality: Relentless shadow-touched fighter that slashes deep to make enemies bleed out.

mobs.name: Wraith
mobs.personality: Vengeful spirit that drains the will of the living with its cursed touch.

rooms.name: Prison Cells
rooms.description: Rusted iron bars line both walls, cells stretching into darkness. Chains rattle with no wind. Something scratches at the stone from inside a sealed cell.

mobs.name: Tortured Soul
mobs.personality: Tormented shade that wails to put intruders into a deathlike sleep.

npcs.name: Elena
npcs.title: Imprisoned Scholar
dialogue: the rift lord feeds on fear

rooms.name: Spiral Staircase
rooms.description: A tight spiral staircase descends into oppressive darkness. The walls are slick with condensation that glows faintly green. Each step echoes like a heartbeat.

rooms.name: Torture Chamber
rooms.description: Iron maidens and racks line the walls, their mechanisms still glistening with dark purpose. The drain in the center of the floor leads somewhere unspeakable.

mobs.name: Demon Torturer
mobs.personality: Sadistic fiend that cleaves through groups and relishes inflicting bleeding wounds.

rooms.name: Crypt Entrance
rooms.description: Ancient sarcophagi line the walls, their lids cracked and displaced. A cold wind rises from the depths, carrying whispers of the restless dead.

mobs.name: Skeleton Guardian
mobs.personality: Tireless bone sentinel that sweeps its massive blade in wide arcs.

mobs.name: Bone Mage
mobs.personality: Calculating necromancer that weakens foes with curses and toxic bolts from afar.

rooms.name: Ancient Tomb
rooms.description: A vast burial chamber dominated by a central sarcophagus of black marble. Runes pulse with sickly purple light along every surface. The air hums with dark energy.

mobs.name: Lich Acolyte
mobs.personality: Ancient undead sorcerer that curses and puts enemies to sleep before draining their life.

rooms.name: Antechamber of Doom
rooms.description: The corridor opens into a chamber pulsing with violet light. Reality itself seems thin here â€” the walls shimmer and warp. Beyond the far archway, darkness writhes.

mobs.name: Death Knight
mobs.personality: Fallen champion in cursed armor that cleaves through ranks and leaves grievous bleeding wounds.

rooms.name: The Shadowfell Rift
rooms.description: A vast cavern where reality has torn open. A swirling vortex of absolute darkness dominates the center, tendrils of shadow reaching outward like grasping fingers. The Void Lord stands before the rift, a towering figure of living shadow and malice.

mobs.name: Void Lord Malachar
mobs.personality: Towering void entity that curses the strongest threat, heals when wounded, and cleaves through clustered foes with tendrils of shadow.
